getFact

public PlotElement getFact(java.lang.String ent)
Returns a plot element that can be told. A piece of background information can be told if all entities have already been mentioned apart from the one that is currently being introduced. An example: the background information that 'the princess lives in a castle' can be added if the princess has already been mentioned and the current plot element contains the castle.

Parameters:
ent -

alreadyMentioned

public boolean alreadyMentioned(java.lang.String ent)
Checks if the entity has already been mentioned
